channel.title: ST Media Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
It’s been nearly a year since the last official update from VOCALOID4 UNI’s parent company, ST Media. But big news just hit from their official YouTube: a new album is over the horizon! UNI’s latest album, 24-Hour Symphony, is now available to pre-order! The album is set to come out on December 16, 2019. Pre-orders …

The post New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been nearly a year since the last official update from VOCALOID4 UNI’s parent company, ST Media. But big news just hit from their official YouTube: a new album is over the horizon!

UNI’s latest album, 24-Hour Symphony, is now available to pre-order! The album is set to come out on December 16, 2019. Pre-orders run from 11/27 – 12/14, so get yours in to qualify for some sweet bonuses! The price is currently set for 18,000 won (~$15 USD), not including shipping.

The album will feature music by renowned Korean VOCALOID producer, Sangnoksu (Evergreen, theyears12, ProgressU). 24-Hour Symphony is actually the first album by the esteemed artist in nearly six years!

The tracklist is filled with a mixture of covers and originals, all sung by the world’s first Korean V4.

Tracklist

  1. 천년의 시 (The Poem of a Millennia) – UNI ver.
  2. Installation
  3. 벚꽃비 (Cherry Blossoms in the Rain)
  4. 25시 (25 o’clock)
  5. 행성의 소나타 (Sonata Planet) – UNI ver.
  6. 해에게서 달까지 (From the Sun to the Moon) – UNI ver.
  7. 태양이 춤추는 나라 (The Land Where the Sun Dances)
  8. 20년 뒤의 나에게 (20 Years Later to Me)
  9. 다물 (Tea)
  10. 24시간의 교향곡 (24-Hour Symphony)

There are several songs that are homages to the original SeeU versions, reworked to feature UNI’s vocals!

The album also features UNI originals, including a demo song from Sangnoksu and one of her first originals. Not only that, but it also features three completely new songs currently exclusive to this album!

Preorder Bonuses

While the preorder period for the album is a little over two weeks, there are some bonuses ST Media announced. While supplies last, people who purchase the album could receive a couple different items!

The first preorder bonus is a 10cm x 15cm illustration card featuring the album cover. This is an enticing prize by itself, but there’s another potential product you can get, as well!

People who preorder quickly enough can also receive an MR download card of the album for digital use!

Sneak Peek

The official page for UNI’s latest album features some reveal images of the album’s physical case and disc!

Furthermore, ST Media has confirmed that the album will be released as a co-production alongside another company. The South Korea-Japan joint venture, milkyway TRAXX, will help ensure high production quality. According to Character Planet, working alongside TRAXX will let them put out the best product for you all!

The official YouTube preview trailer has been released! Take a look, here:

Preorder the album here, on Character Planet!

How excited are you for the newest UNI release? Let us know in the comments!

Sources

ST Media is on Twitter, YouTube and their official product website, Character Planet!
Sangnoksu can be found on Twitter, YouTube and SoundCloud.

The post New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
For those of you who have been wanting to get the voicebanks of  UNI, Luo Tianyi, Mo Qingxian, Yuezheng Longya and/or Zhiyu Moke but did not want to deal with ST MEDiA’s website or Taobao, you can now buy them on the VOCALOID shop!

Prices

To listen to the samples or purchase the voicebanks you can head on over to the VOCALOID shop here!

Featured image source: https://www.facebook.com/yamaha.vocaloid/photos/a.232686870185206/1952688848184991/?type=3&theater

The post Uni and Vsinger Voicebanks Now Available on the VOCALOID Shop appeared first on VNN.

item.title: First Official UNI Album Releasing Soon!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The first official UNI album will be available soon! If you are a fan of hers and have always wanted some UNI products, then now is your time. Entitled “I Love Moonlight,” the album is set to be released on December 1st, and will come with two different order options. You can purchase the album …

The post First Official UNI Album Releasing Soon! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The first official UNI album will be available soon! If you are a fan of hers and have always wanted some UNI products, then now is your time. Entitled “I Love Moonlight,” the album is set to be released on December 1st, and will come with two different order options. You can purchase the album on its own for 15,000₩ ($15 USD) here, or the limited edition for 63,000₩ ($58 USD) that includes an LED stand of UNI here.

 

Track List

  • Boundary
  •  어제, 오늘, 내일
  • Installation
  • 작별 카운트다운
  • Elixir
  • 愛情販売機
  • CONNECTED
  • 아브라카다브라
  • U.N.I
  • 벚꽃비
  • 산책
  • 우주에 단 하나뿐인 너에게 부르는 노래

Cross Fade

If you want the limited edition, then make sure to get yours quickly, as there are only 100 of them available. Global shipping will also be possible for those outside of Korea. Note that the LED stand will not be available for purchase separately.

Stay tuned to VNN for more information!

ST MEDiA’s official website

 

The post First Official UNI Album Releasing Soon! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: SeeU Will be Available on Character Planet!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Although the Korean VOCALOID SeeU has been out for some time, fans still love her. Some fans have recently noticed that she was no longer available online, but, there was a reason for this. She was being prepared for sale on ST MEDiA‘s website “Character Planet”! Although she is not available exactly yet, she is …

The post SeeU Will be Available on Character Planet! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Although the Korean VOCALOID SeeU has been out for some time, fans still love her. Some fans have recently noticed that she was no longer available online, but, there was a reason for this. She was being prepared for sale on ST MEDiA‘s website “Character Planet”! Although she is not available exactly yet, she is not far! Her orders will be opening on August 23rd! Not only that, but she will be available with a discount until September 6th. Although she will still be available afterwards, she will be at full price.

Packages

There will be three SeeU packages available for purchase.

SeeU Packagae

Price: 83 000₩ ($73 USD) Discounted /Regular 143 000 ₩ ($125 USD)

Includes:

  • 2 badges
  • A key holder
  • Photo frame
  • Stickers

You can purchase SeeU only here.

Unity set

Price: 198 000₩ ($174 USD) Discounted /Regular 267 000 ₩ ($234 USD)

 

Includes:

  • SeeU’s voicebank DVD
  • UNI‘s voicebank DVD

You can purchase the set here.

Starter Pack

Price: 297 000₩ ($260 USD) Discounted /Regular 377 000 ₩ ($330 USD)

Includes:

  • All of the above
  • VOCALOID 4 Editor

You can purchase the starter pack here.

Note: SeeU is compatible with the V3 and V4 editor, but UNI is only compatible with the V4 Editor.

There is an English buying guide for those of you who have trouble navigating the Korean website here.

Shipping will be available internationally!

Update: She will also be available for download on the same day!

Links

Official Website
Facebook
Twitter

The post SeeU Will be Available on Character Planet! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: UNI’s Download Version Available for Purchase!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Last month on February 14th, the new Korean VOCALOID UNI was released, however, only her physical copy could be purchased. If you have been waiting for her download, she is now available! You can now head over to Character Planet (UNI’s official website) and buy her digital download. Her download is available for ₩124,000 KRW …

The post UNI’s Download Version Available for Purchase! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Last month on February 14th, the new Korean VOCALOID UNI was released, however, only her physical copy could be purchased. If you have been waiting for her download, she is now available!

You can now head over to Character Planet (UNI’s official website) and buy her digital download. Her download is available for ₩124,000 KRW ($110 USD). Remember that there is an English buying guide for UNI if you have trouble navigating Korean. You can find it here. She will also be available on the English VOCALOID shop in the near future.

Links

Official Website
Facebook
Twitter

The post UNI’s Download Version Available for Purchase! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Send Us Your Questions About UNI!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Many fans are excited about the new Korean VOCALOID UNI, and have questions about the future of UNI and ST MEDiA. VNN is opening up questions about UNI that will be relayed to ST MEDiA and answered by UNI’s creator, Dr. Yun himself! How do you send us your questions, you may ask? Comment on …

The post Send Us Your Questions About UNI! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Many fans are excited about the new Korean VOCALOID UNI, and have questions about the future of UNI and ST MEDiA. VNN is opening up questions about UNI that will be relayed to ST MEDiA and answered by UNI’s creator, Dr. Yun himself!

How do you send us your questions, you may ask?

  • Comment on our Facebook post
  • Send us a message on any of our social media accounts
  • Contact us on our website
  • Tag us on Twitter

We will gather all of your questions and have them answered by ST MEDiA. The deadline for sending them in will be March 11th. Once we have all the answers to your questions, we will compile them in one article for everyone to see. Stay tuned!

UNI’s Official Website

The post Send Us Your Questions About UNI! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID UNI Pre-orders and Release Date!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Since the reveal of UNI’s design back in August of 2015, everyone has been anxious as to when her official release date will be. Well, the long wait is finally over. We now have an official release date! Physical copies will be available for pre-order on her official website “Character Planet.” There is even a countdown …

The post VOCALOID UNI Pre-orders and Release Date! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Since the reveal of UNI’s design back in August of 2015, everyone has been anxious as to when her official release date will be. Well, the long wait is finally over. We now have an official release date! Physical copies will be available for pre-order on her official website “Character Planet.” There is even a countdown for you to see. Pre-orders for her physical copy will open on February 2nd.

UPDATE: You can now pre-order your physical copies globally! (Note that shipping will vary on location.)

If you prefer the download version, this will be available on Character Planet as well as the VOCALOID shop soon. We will make further announcements once it will be available. She will be released on February 14th of this year, just in time for Valentine’s Day!

You can find more information on prices in our previous article here.

Links

Official Website

Facebook

Twitter

Survey (Korean)

The post VOCALOID UNI Pre-orders and Release Date! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID UNI Demo, Price, and Product Page!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
After much anticipation about the upcoming Korean VOCALOID UNI, the wait is almost over and we have some final details before her release! Product Page You can now view her product page with price and information about UNI (Korean). No worries, though. We will give you the important details in English! Price There will also be a …

The post VOCALOID UNI Demo, Price, and Product Page! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After much anticipation about the upcoming Korean VOCALOID UNI, the wait is almost over and we have some final details before her release!

Product Page

You can now view her product page with price and information about UNI (Korean). No worries, though. We will give you the important details in English!

Price

There will also be a small sale on her release, so be sure to grab her with the discount!

Voice Bank

 

Regular Price: ₩124,000 KRW ($106 USD)

Sale Price: ₩119,000 KRW ($102 USD)

Starter Pack (Voice Bank w/ VOCALOID 4 Editor)

 

Regular Price: ₩234,000 KRW ($200 USD)

Sale Price: ₩224,000 KRW ($192 USD)

Demo

Lastly, we know everyone is anxious to know her final release date. Below is a message from ST MEDiA:

We have done everything we have to do and we are awaiting the approval for her release from YAMAHA.

Stay tuned for her release date on VNN!

Links

Official Website

Facebook

Twitter

Survey (Korean)

 

For more information on UNI, check out our previous articles:

VOCALOID UNI’s Demo is Now Live!

VOCALOID UNI’s Voice Bank, Languages, Release Date and Demo Revealed!

The post VOCALOID UNI Demo, Price, and Product Page! appeared first on VNN.

As VOCALOID fans, a lot of us enjoy physical media and goodies, therefore VNN and ST MEDiA want your feedback! The survey is focused on the interest of having an easier and cheaper way to purchase the physical …

The post VOCALOID UNI Survey appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the release of UNI quickly approaching, VNN and ST MEDiA have created a survey for the fans. As VOCALOID fans, a lot of us enjoy physical media and goodies, therefore VNN and ST MEDiA want your feedback! The survey is focused on the interest of having an easier and cheaper way to purchase the physical release of her voice bank internationally.

The survey is only a few questions long and your answers are very much appreciated.

You can answer these question at the following link here.

The post VOCALOID UNI Survey appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID UNI’s Demo is Now Live!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The newest Korean VOCALOID UNI had her design revealed back in August 2015, and fans have been excited ever since. Until now, we only had a voice sample of her. However, we now have a full demo showcasing her full potential. Check it out! We also have a message from ST Media: Thanks for your …

The post VOCALOID UNI’s Demo is Now Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The newest Korean VOCALOID UNI had her design revealed back in August 2015, and fans have been excited ever since.

Until now, we only had a voice sample of her.

However, we now have a full demo showcasing her full potential. Check it out!

We also have a message from ST Media:

Thanks for your interest in UNI even if there is very little information on UNI.

We are sorry for the delay of UNI’s release. But we are doing our best to make UNI’s voice much better.

UNI will be released with 2 libraries (Korean), Original and Append (Soft/Power).

The original library will be released in January 2017, and Append (Soft/Power) will be released in the summer of 2017.

We will start to develop UNI’s English library once the append library has been released.

We will announce UNI’s release date later on “VOCALOID Empire” and “VOCALOID Talks” Facebook page.

And we will make an announcement in English as well on VNN.

We will not disappoint since you have been waiting for UNI and us for a long time, and we will do our best for you.

Thank you very much.

 

VOCALOID Talks Facebook

VOCALOID Empire Facebook 

Stay tuned on VNN for all future dates!

The post VOCALOID UNI’s Demo is Now Live! appeared first on VNN.
